title: Naked Determination: 41 Stories About Overcoming Fear
description: Discover this author's 41 most exciting and inspiring adventures...66 reviews averaging 4.7***** at Amazon. If you liked the "Chicken Soup" series you'll love this life skills book. 41 Stories about #TRUST #ESSENTIALs #TIMING #SMILING #GUTS #RED_SHOES #SHRINK #AFFAIRS #SEX #LOVE #PROFESSIONAL_LIFE #EMAILS #MONEY #FINANCIAL_DISCIPLINE #ELECTRIC_ENERGY #REJECTION #PROBLEMS#FUTURE #TREES #HOPEBRONZE at the eLit Awards 2012 (category inspirational/motivational)5***** at Readers Favorite
author: Gisela Hausmann
